profile.name: Ugo
profile.title:
QA / Business Developer
IT and Medical devices

par1.text: I’m a Berlin based **QA consultant** and **Business Developer** specialized in IT and **Healthcare** industry. With a M.Sc. In Biomedical Engineering, I’m working since 2010 in high regulated industry for clinical diagnostics, applying the most advanced methodology of project and quality management. I’m also an entrepreneur and I **love working with startups** as mentor, investor and co-founder. I'm **Italian** native speaker with working proficiency in **English** and **German**, which allows my multidisciplinary network to grow constantly across **Europe**.

about.par2:

jobs.title: Engineer Quality - System Integration
jobs.summary:
External Consultant for Roche Diagnostics
Requirement analysis and test case design for software, hardware and consumables development.
Informal and formal testing and test results analysis, reporting and tracking issues, such as verifying fixes.
Assisting the Test Manager/Department Project Leader with the creation of required test documentation (e.g., test plans and test reports).
Ensuring adherence to relevant QAPs, SOPs and providing input to continually improve V&V processes.

jobs.title: Development Engineer
jobs.summary:
Software development, data acquisition and signal processing (LabVIEW) for embedded sensors.
Code-Optimization (LabVIEW) under the NI-Guidelines.

jobs.title: Internship – Ultrasound Technology
jobs.summary: Studying the effects of LIPUS (Low Intensity Pulsed Ultrasounds) on Mesenchymal Stromal Cells for bone regeneration

jobs.title: Internship – Tissue Engineering
jobs.summary: Designed a streamlined manufacturing system for bone regeneration, using freshly isolated Adipose Tissue Stromal Cells. Produced Bio-Artificial scaffolds suitable in perfusion bioreactors. Acquired working autonomy in biosafety level 2 laboratories.
